actions.name: Aura Break
actions.description: Effect: Suppresses the effects of other creatures' [Aura] attacks and abilities on the field, and reduces the Power of attacks made by creatures that possess [Aura] abilities by 25%.

system.description: Effect: Suppresses the effects of other creatures' [Aura] attacks and abilities on the field, and reduces the Power of attacks made by creatures that possess [Aura] abilities by 25%.
